Title: The Mermaid: Lake of the Dead
Genre: Drama, Fantasy, Horror, Mystery, Romance, Thriller
Writer: Natalya Dubovaya, Ivan Kapitonov, Svyatoslav Podgaevskiy
Actors: Viktoriya Agalakova, Efim Petrunin, Sofia Shidlovskaya, Nikita Elenev
Plot: An evil Mermaid falls in love with Marina's fiancé Roman and aims to keep him away from Marina in her Kingdom of Death under water. The Mermaid is a young woman who drowned a few centuries ...
